tag_list: management-training, leadership-training, management-and-leadership-qualification, brighton, claire-walsh, lcp, ilm
overview: Managing partner and co-founder of management training, business consultancy and coaching providers Learning Consultancy Partnership (LCP). LCP’s Claire Walsh has over 20 years experience in the field of HR, learning & development and training. LCP were founded in 2004 and Claire continues to expand their client base and range of services, including recently introducing ILM’s level 5 management and leadership skills qualification in partnership with Link Consultancy in Brighton.
